Content: To repel the empire of humankind one can discover the ''heretical
truth'', so with enough social science and an archive of humanities
history the player can conduct a special project proofing that: if
humanities first contact would have been friendly, they would bee part

of a xenophile federation.
Sending this proof to the imperial
invasion fleet pacifies it and the empire quarantines the galaxy so
this information can not destabilize the wider empire.
